query:
SELECT s.id, s.siteNumber, c.name as centreName, s.mapMarkerX, s.mapMarkerY 
FROM sites s 
JOIN centres c ON s.centreId = c.id 
WHERE (s.mapMarkerX > 100 OR s.mapMarkerY > 100) 
AND s.mapMarkerX IS NOT NULL 
ORDER BY c.name, s.siteNumber;
command:

FROM sites s
